extendedInfo.description: Addicting arcade action - fly an Air Force MQ-9 Reaper Drone (Predator) through the  desert and use your Hellfire missiles to eliminate terrorists. Use the laser to point at targets like call of duty. Fly over recon targets and snap intelligence photos, while avoiding enemy radar.  Avoid and destroy Russian HIND helicopters, and DO NOT hit the NO-STRIKE targets or you will lose life!  Luckily, a zombie gunship will send some care packages that will provide you with more health, stealth capability (the beast of Kandahar) to avoid the enemy radar and diplomatic immunity to shoot over the mosques and temple run.Challenging arcade action that rewards you with more life every 10,000 points.  Game uses accelerometer to fly the uav. Answer the call of duty and make them fear the reaper! Brought to you by Black Ops Pops, the makers of CamGun - predator drone zombie uav

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Not an awesome game. Gameplay is repetitive and boring. I wish wouldn\'t have bought this. Not worth the money.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: challenging but very fun
reviews.comment: But very fun _ diplomatic immunity lol

reviews.title: Addictive
